channel.title: Posts on Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Site

item.title: class 1
item.description: Command ~ - tilde means home directory mkdir - make directory - to create a folder touch - to create a file ls - listing - to check available file cd - change directory rm - remove file or folder cp - copy mv - move / cut pwd - present working directory flag flag always start with hyphen -. a - all r - recursive f - force Identifier .
